mdRecord.dcterms:title: Notes, dimensions of rooms at Mount Vernon, 1796
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Pearce, William
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Document included height of Mr. W.'s room, size of windows, upper windows west side of M[ansion] house, size of New Room chimney, the windows on west side of cellar. Autograph document, 2 page, in hand of William Pearce (?) docketed "The Sizes of the windows & C.", probably enclosed in letter to George Washington on November 13, 1796, watermark (1794, & IV).
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Washington, George, 1732-1799
